name: Crabbie Attack! (NES)
description:
Whoever said turtles and pizza go together were wrong! Toby and Walton were celebrating at a party and had a little too much pizza. That night, they shared the same nightmare of crabbie invaders! You must help guide our turtle heroes through a non-stop stream of crabbies! Tons of levels and amazing power-ups will keep you on the edge of your seat! For more information, follow our Twitter account at @TurtleRescueNES

This is the full edition of CRABBIE ATTACK! This game plays on NES emulators or original NES hardware using flashcarts.
